attributes.action: The return of capital punishment for acts of terrorism against britain
attributes.additional_details:
I call for the return of Capital Punishment for convicted terrorists.

We hear more and more about torrorists planning and plotting to kill, injure and maime the british public in the name of islam. It is time we took a stand against such terrorists, a stand to show them that these acts will NOT go unpunished and the most severe punishment will be dealt.

Bring back capital punishment for convicted torrorists!!!
